availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wesley T. Fowler (Caldwell co., ky, carpenter)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of William Fowler and Nancy Fowler. Filed a marriage bond to Elizabeth McWaters Fowler in Eddyville, Kentucky, on January 12, 859. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Carpenter in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 319B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 3.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lyon County Marriages, Film #000321364, p. 395.
"Wesley T. Fowler (1833-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial #7148841, accessed April 15, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/7148841.
